Package sep.gaia.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyboardListener
    TODO
    KeyboardLocationAdapter
    This class is to implement the KeyAdapter interface to check if the user wants to search for a location by entering a string into the search field of the tool bar.
    KeyboardMoveAdapter
    This is to extent a KeyAdapter to check if the user wants to rotate the virtual earth by pressing one of the arrow keys.
    KeyboardRotationAdapter
    This is to extent a KeyAdapter to check if the user wants to rotate the virtual earth by pressing one of the arrow keys.
    KeyboardZoomAdapter
    This is to extent a KeyAdapter to check if the user wants to zoom in or out of the virtual earth by pressing the + / - keys.
    MarkerBarButtonListener  
    MarkerBarListener
    This is to implement the ActionListener Interface to check if the user wants to switch the view to a marker which he/she set before by pressing an item in the list or delete or rename a marker in the markerbar.
    MouseClickedListener
    This is to check if the user has pressed on a wikipedia symbol or on the compass in the canvas or if the user wants to set a marker after selecting the marker button in the toolbar.
    MouseDraggedListener2d
    TODO
    MouseDraggedListener3d
    This is to implement the MouseListener Interface and the MouseMotionListener Interface to check if the user wants to rotate the virtual earth by clicking and dragging the mouse in the desired direction.
    MouseHoverListener
    Listener for processing mouse-hover events, such as the mouse being over a marker.
    MouseZoomListener
    This is to implement the MouseWheelListener Interface to check if the user wants to zoom in or out of the virtual earth by rotating the wheel of the mouse.
    POIBarListener
    This is to implement the ActionListener Interface to check if the user wants to change the categories of the PointOfInterest objects which should be displayed in the view by setting a ComboBox in the poibar.
